title: Trevor Jackson and Jason Mitchell Interview and More
itunes:title: Trevor Jackson and Jason Mitchell Interview and More
description:
Tuesday 6/12- Today on the show we had Jason Mitchell and Trevor Jackson stop by to speak on their new movie "Superfly" and lets just say things got interesting when talk about marriage came up. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to A Memphis grandmother who was letting children out of a pet kennels in the back of an SUV. Also, we had listeners call up for "Shoot Your Shot" and lets just say kids were involved. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
